data.event_time_duration: June 1 at 6:00 AM to Sep 15 10:00 PM
data.event_html:
After Organising LEH LADAKH rides from the last 3 Years we are back with INCREDIBLE LEH LADAKH TOURS FOR 2016 and this year we are organising 4 rides in different months. So that everyone who want to do his/her dream ride can plan rides accordingly.

I TOUR : 1 st JUNE ~ 15 th JUNE
II TOUR : 25th JUNE ~ 9th JULY
III TOUR : 1st AUGUST ~ 12th AUGUST ( FOR FEMALES ONLY )
IV TOUR : 1st SEPTEMBER ~ 15th SEPTEMBER

A JOURNEY OF THOUSAND MILES BEGIN WITH A SINGLE STEP

INCREDIBLE LEH LADAKH ~ I TOUR


Dates: 1st June 2016 to 15th June 2016

Route: DELHI ~ HOSIYARPUR ~ JAMMU ~ SRINAGAR ~ KARGIL ~ LEH ~ NUBRA VALLEY ~ PANGONG TSO ~ MANALI ~ DELHI

Cost: INR 28000/- (per person)

INCREDIBLE LEH LADAKH ~ II TOUR


Dates: 25th June 2016 to 9th July 2016

Route: DELHI ~ KULLU ~ MANALI ~ LEH ~ NUBRA VALLEY ~ PANGONG TSO ~ KARGIL ~ ZANSKAR VALLEY ~ SRINAGAR ~ JAMMU ~ DELHI HOSIYARPUR ~ JAMMU

Cost: INR 17000/- (per person)

INCREDIBLE LEH LADAKH ~ III TOUR ( FOR FEMALES ONLY )


Dates: 1st Aug 2016 to 12th Aug 2016

Route: MANALI ~ LEH ~ NUBRA VALLEY ~ PANGONG TSO ~ LEH ~ MANALI

Cost: INR 25000/- (per person)

INCREDIBLE LEH LADAKH ~ IV TOUR


Dates: 1st Sep 2016 to 12th Sep 2016

Route: DELHI ~ HOSIYARPUR ~ JAMMU ~ SRINAGAR ~ KARGIL ~ LEH ~ NUBRA VALLEY ~ PANGONG TSO ~ MANALI ~ DELHI

Cost: INR 28000/- (per person)

INCLUSIONS:

  • All meals ( Breakfast / Lunch / Dinner )
  • Triple sharing accommodation in Camps/Hotels
  • Team leader
  • Support back up vehicle
  • Support staff
  • Mechanic for breakdown services
  • All Permits
  • All permission from army
  • Theme dinner with bonfire at PANGONG and NUBRA VALLEY
  • First aid kit
  • Oxygen cylinders in emergency
  • Support staff
  • All applicable taxes

EXCLUSION:

  • Extra Transportation
  • Any expense incurred due to force majeure
  • Expense for table order or water or table drinks

NOTE: Trip schedule is subjected to change as per roads & weather conditions so take a day or two in buffer. This is not an ordinary place its "INCREDBILE LEH LADAKH TOUR". Only Team members have the right to take decision depending on above.

Do's and Don't for the Team:

First rule of this trip You have to follow & listen to the guidelines of the team Leader.

1. Respect each other and the cause we are going for.

2. Follow the timeline. Integrity and discipline should be followed. Follow the traffic rules.

3. Head gear is mandatory for all the participants. And if possible arm and knee pads.

4. Organizers will not be responsible for any kind of damage during the trip.

5. Participants are responsible for their own motorcycle and personnel belongings, gears and the damage.

6. Participants are required to carry their own Bike Bulb, clutch wire etc. In any malfunctioning our mechanic will fix it and repair but TEAM DBATG & TEAM EXTREME ADVENTURE SEEKERS will not provide any gear.

7. Participants must have their own Royal Enfield or other bike above 150 CC (Those who don't have bike can get on rent, we can help you find it)

8. Age above 18 years.

Note: REGISTRATION is on first come first served basis.

One have to register with deposit of 10000/- per person and Send entries before the entries get filled Please forward following details on E-Mail:-

1. Name

2. Age

3. Address

4. Contact info. (One additional number of any family member in case of emergency )

5. Occupation

6. Bike Details with copy of RC in your name and valid insurance.

7. Photograph (4 passport size photographs must be ready)

8. Scanned Copy of your Driving License. (License not required for/pillion/non biker).

9. Occupation

Cancellation Policy: * 50% of the amount of deposited money is refundable only when cancellation is done before 10 days of the journey.

Bank Account details:

BANK: AXIS BANK LTD.
ACCOUNT NAME: DELHI BIKERS ADVENTURE TOUR GROUP
ACCOUNT NUMBER: 914020010095494
BRANCH: PALWAL, HARYANA
IFS CODE: UTIB0000429

After depositing the amount just send the Refrence Number if you are transfering amount, scanned copy or a picture of the pay in slip at delhibikersadventuregroup@gmail.com

Kindly confirm your payment on:- +91-9255880005

Be prepared for fun filled memorable journey for life. Its not a luxury trip but an extreme adventure ride prepare yourself and get your best.

For More Info Contact us on following Details
